entry.title: What is hacking?
entry.summary: Hacking is often misconcepted as the activity of breaking the security of computer systems. Is also mistakenly associated with viruses and other kind of malware. What hacking actually means for it's practicioners is a form of motivation towards finding clever solutions. It is the pleasure of finding a clever solution to a complex problem.

entry.title: Your first GNU/Linux
entry.summary: GNU/Linux is the OS (operating system) of choice of most hackers, widely used by programmers and adopted by vast majority of web servers. This article gives a gentle introduction into the intricacies of this OS.
